sys_hub_flow.name: 8570 Notifications

sys_variable_value.value: Your 8570 Compliance is about to expire

sys_element_mapping.value:
Dear 2➛8570 Candidate Record➛Candidate➛First name,

Our records show that your  2➛8570 Candidate Record➛Baseline Certification➛Name or 2➛8570 Candidate Record➛CE Certification➛Name has expired. Please renew your certification.

Thanks,

IA Team

Dear 2➛8570 Candidate Record➛Candidate➛First name,

Our records show that your 2➛8570 Candidate Record➛Baseline Certification or 2➛8570 Candidate Record➛CE Certificationis about to expire. Please renew your certification.

Thanks,

IA Team
